metadata.title: CVE-2024-35434 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Irontec Sngrep v1.8.1 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow viathe function rtp_check_packet at /sngrep/src/rtp.c. This vulnerabilityallows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted SIPpacket.

criterions.comment: sngrep package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
